item.title: Checking syscalls with different batch sizes
item.description: Ozone Performance #7: Checking syscalls with different batch sizes Date: 2020-02-11 Ozone master: 3ddcdbbef Ratis master: 0.5.0-90cd474-SNAPSHOT Docker image: elek/ozonedev:20200211-1 How to test? Deploy a single Datanode which is forced to be in FOLLOWER mode.
